ItemConsumable.name: deflector band
ItemConsumable.description: A self contained reflective shield bracelet. To fit a thermal shielding unit in something so small meant an integral non replenishable fuel cell and less robust parts however.

statusDefence.removeText: with a dying fizzle, series of popping sounds and a scent of burning electronics the deflector band is reduced to a piece of unsightly useless jewelry.

effectstatus.applyText: with a shrill whine the bracelet powers on. A faint shimmer of deflective energy forming around you.
